title: Three CoS/CoO microspheres and their mixed matrix membranes for the highly efficient photocatalytic degradation of methyl blue
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25811-25819
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03261F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuping Huo, Tanlai Yu, Yueyuan Xue, Guoshuai Zhang, Shengxin Song, Yonghua Shao, Xiaojing Han
Three CoS/CoO microspheres were solvothermally prepared by simply modulating the polymerization degree of PEG, and the mixed matrix membrane of 3 displayed excellent photocatalytic degradation performance and reusability (cycles > 12 times).
